gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 120, Spurs 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Spurs, 120-108. Jaren Jackson Jr. recorded 27 points and five rebounds for the Grizzlies, with Desmond Bane adding 26 points and five rebounds in the victory. Victor Wembanyama tallied 19 points, 13 rebounds, and a career-high 8 blocks for the Spurs in the losing effort. The Grizzlies improve to 3-9 on the season, while the Spurs fall to 3-10.
